page.title: 13Transport
page.content: Most families have a car of their own but some people, especially older people, have to use the buses, or walk. The bus company, Badgerline, runs buses from Stratton to Midsomer Norton, Radstock, Bath, Frome and Shepton Mallet. From Chilcompton buses go to Midsomer Norton, Radstock, Bath and Wells. The buses run about every hour from 0700 to 2000. There are very few buses after 2000. Most of the buses are single deckers but some are double deckers with seats upstairs as well. It is quite expensive on the bus;it costs 50p to go two miles. When you get on the bus you have to pay the driver who gives you a ticket.
